1.name: March Speed (All Troops)
1.text: Increases the march speed of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

2.name: Attack (All Troops)
2.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

3.name: Health (All Troops)
3.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

4.name: Defense (All Troops)
4.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

6.name: Vortex
6.text: Grants a 10% chance to decrease target march speed by ${1}% for the next 3 seconds whenever an active skill is used

7.name: Lightning Charge
7.text: Increases march speed of all troops by ${1}%

9.name: Swiftness
9.text: When troops led by this commander are attacked by an active skill, increases march speed by ${1}% for the next 5 seconds

10.name: Attack (All Troops)
10.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

11.name: Attack (All Troops)
11.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

12.name: Health (All Troops)
12.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

13.name: Defense (All Troops)
13.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

14.name: Hasty Departure
14.text: When troops led by this commander depart from a structure, increases march speed by ${1}% for the next 10 seconds

15.name: March Speed (All Troops)
15.text: Increases the march speed of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

16.name: Health (All Troops)
16.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

17.name: Defense (All Troops)
17.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

18.name: Alacrity
18.text: Troops led by this commander have a ${1}% chance to resist enemy slow effects

19.name: Time Management
19.text: Increases march speed of all troops by ${1}% when not in combat, but decreases march speed by ${1}% while in combat

20.name: Triumphant March
20.text: When armies led by this commander defeat an army belonging to another governor, increases march speed by ${1}% for the next 10 seconds
